Suggested_Setup: Enemies attack from both front and rear simultaneously.
Ranged enemies fire from inaccessible cliffs/rooftops; players must climb or take cover.
An enemy pretends to be wounded/trapped to lure players into a kill zone.
Heavy enemies block a narrow bridge/tunnel; players must break the line.
A sentient handler commands a pack of non-sapient beasts to attack.
Weak enemies swarm endlessly for X rounds until a spawner/leader is destroyed.
Enemies are attacking a neutral NPC; players must protect the NPC during the fight.
The battle takes place in a dangerous area (rising water, fire, toxic gas).
A single powerful enemy challenges one player to single combat; others intervene at a cost.
Fast enemies strike, retreat out of range, and strike again (kiting).
Enemies ignore players to focus on completing a spell/device; stop them before the timer ends.
Enemies on mounts/vehicles attempt to trample or drive-by attack the players.
Enemies act from stealth or camouflage; players must detect them to hit them.
One massive, slow enemy with high defense; requires flanking or heavy damage to drop.
Three-way battle. Two rival factions are fighting; players are caught in the middle.
Enemies attempt to destroy the players' vehicle/camp/gear rather than kill the players.
Enemies possess abilities/gear eerily similar to the party's own.
One enemy deals massive damage from extreme range; players must close the gap under fire.
The enemy changes forms/stats when it reaches 50% health (Phase 2).
Enemies are rigged to explode on death; players must kill them at range.
